demo.title: Conflict Resolution System
demo.subtitle: Demo and test the conflict detection and resolution features
demo.navigateMessage: Navigate to the Conflict Resolution page to review and resolve them
demo.strategyKeepLocalDescription: Preserve the local version and discard remote changes
demo.strategyKeepRemoteDescription: Accept the remote version and overwrite local changes
demo.strategyMergeBothDescription: Combine local and remote changes into a single version
demo.strategyManualEditDescription: Manually edit the conflicting data to create a custom resolution
demo.indicatorDescription: The conflict indicator can be placed anywhere in the UI to show active conflicts
demo.toastLocalCreated: Simulated local file created. Now simulating a remote conflict...
demo.toastSimulationComplete: Conflict simulation complete! Click "Detect Conflicts" to see it.
demo.toastResolveAllSuccess: All conflicts resolved using local versions
